description: Defensive techniques designed to protect against attacks, redirect force, and create opportunities for counter-attacks.

focusAreas: Proper angle and positioning for maximum protection
Timing and anticipation of incoming attacks
Body alignment and stability during execution
safety: Always maintain proper wrist and forearm alignment
Use controlled force when practicing with partners
Focus on redirection rather than brute force
Keep non-blocking hand in guarding position

techniques.description: Basic middle-level block using inner forearm to deflect attacks

techniques.application: Defending against punches and strikes to the midsection, solar plexus, and ribs.
steps: Start from ready stance with arms in guarding position
Swing blocking arm across body in circular motion
Make contact with inner forearm surface
Angle forearm at 45 degrees to deflect force

techniques.description: Low block using knife hand to defend against lower attacks
